viewData.name: Black Mask
viewData.short_description: Deep cleansing purifying peel-off mask that delivers powerful detoxifying and brightening results.
viewData.long_description: PhiAcademy Black Mask is intensive mask with a moist afterfeel deep cleans the skin, ridding it of impurities and excess sebum. Purifies and soothes skin with unique properties of Silt ΓÇô contains the highest quality earth clays to unclog pores and absorb excess oil. Leaves skin looked polished and smooth. Helps to noticeably refine the appearance of pores.
